CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Eni is an integrated oil and gas company that explores for, produces, and refines oil around the world. In 2021, the company produced 0.8 million barrels of liquids and 4.6 billion cubic feet of natural gas per day. At end-2021, Eni held reserves of 6.6 billion barrels of oil equivalent, 49% of which are liquids. The Italian government owns a 30.1% stake in the company. Eni is placing its renewable and low-carbon business in a separate entity, Plentitude; it plans to list publicly in 2022.
